casebody.data:
STATE
v.
GWYNNE 2017-1506 Supreme Court of Ohio. December 31, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion to participate in oral argument scheduled for January 8, 2019, of amicus curiae Ohio Association of Criminal Defense Lawyers. Motion granted. Amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellee.
